document.full_text: al qaeda's most influential english-language preacher said revolts sweeping the arab world would help rather than harm its cause by giving islamists freed from tyranny greater scope to speak out.
document.title: qaeda: arab revolts herald "great leap forward"
lines_and_colors: al qaeda's most influential english-language preacher said revolts sweeping the arab world would help rather than harm its cause by giving islamists freed from tyranny greater scope to speak out.
